import * as React from "react"; import LoginStyled from "./LoginStyled"; import logo from "../../assets/logo-quero-quero.png"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useState } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const Login: React.FC = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [id, setId] = useState(""); const [senha, setSenha] = useState(""); function entrar(e: any) { e.preventDefault(); axios .post("http://localhost:3001/getUser", { id: id, senha: senha, }) .then((response) => { if (response.data === "logado") { navigate("/home"); } else { alert("Senha incorreta!"); } }); } return (
setId(e.target.value)} />
setSenha(e.target.value)} />

); }; export default Login;
